Key.English: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.
Key.German: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.
Key.Polish: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.
Key.French: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.
Key.Spanish: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.
Key.Italian: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.
Key.Czech: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.

Key.English: View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).
Key.German: View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).
Key.Polish: View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).
Key.French: View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).
Key.Spanish: View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).
Key.Italian: View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).
Key.Czech: View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).

Key.English: Login to the Mars editor. You will either have to be the first person to login (if allowed by server), or have a whitelisted Steam account on this server.
